title: Моя мелодия
overview: The heroes of this program have conquered many creative peaks, they are popular and loved by the audience. And everyone has their own melody that warms the soul, helps to love and believe in the future. The star guests of the show are waiting for unexpected surprises and bright emotions, and their fans will have a unique opportunity to learn about the important moments that turned the fate of their idols, and hear touching stories. Each sound of the "secret melody" will respond in the soul of the heroes with bright nostalgic memories and will give the audience a chance to live together with the hero the most joyful, and sometimes the saddest moments of his life. The show's host is the inimitable Nikolai Baskov.
